txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Needed: Coarse fur from the heartier beasts near and within the central Lone-lands. The furs will be used to craft cloaks. If you have enough furs, see Lieva Dourlily.
'A bit rough, still they will do the trick. Perhaps in time, I will earn enough to leave this forsaken place.\n\n'Thank you.'
'I know there are lynx in the lands to the east...their fur should suffice, and if there are wolves or those bigger wolves, they may have the fur I need too.'
Lieva Dourlily posted a desire for coarse fur, found on some beasts in the central Lone-lands. She desires to make cloaks from the furs.
Deliver the coarse furs to Lieva Dourlily at The Forsaken Inn

This task requires the acquisition of coarse furs which can be found on the heartier beasts found along the road east into the central Lone-lands. Lieva Dourlily wants the furs to make cloaks. Lieva can be found at The Forsaken Inn.
Needed: Coarse fur from the heartier beasts near and within the central Lone-lands.
